alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:35PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Garfield County through 330 PM MDT... At 234 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Cohagen, or 13 miles southeast of Jordan, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jordan, Cohagen and Van Norman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
